aka: Does the American Moon Rise Over Itaewon
trans_title: Does the American Moon Rise Over Itaewon
introduction: SYNOPSISYu-jin is a member of a gang in Itaewon district. He will do anything for money, even take a knife. The only person he cares about is his half brother Dol-ee. Shany and Geum-ja are dancers in clubs in Itaewon. They will sleep with anyone, even foreigners, for money. Shany and Geum-ja only have each other to lean on. Nam-ok and Jang-sook have their own fantasies about America and are obsessed by the American dream. Jang-po is an Itaewon mob boss who cruelly extorts money from the young people of Itaewon. These people fight each other with tragic consequences. Under the Itaewon sky, their suffering and tragic love continue.故事尤金是在梨泰院流氓成员。我毫不犹豫地为了钱而筹钱。如果有一个他爱的人，那只有一个半兄弟的石头。沙尼和宝塔是在梨泰院跳舞跳舞的女孩。几分钱的钱，外国人不要犹豫。Shannie和Goldilocks彼此相爱，抚慰他们的寂寞。Aok和Jang Sook是对美国的爱和渴望，对他们有强烈的依恋的女孩。漳浦是梨泰院流氓黑帮的教父，他们在梨泰院对年轻人进行无情的剥削。他们为斗争而奋斗，过着悲惨的生活。在梨泰院的天堂，这些年轻人导致痛苦和悲惨的爱情。
